attributes.action: Change fuel price as the price is way to high ppl wages don't cover the cost
attributes.additional_details: Things need to change is fuel price dropped or minimum wage raised before next year to £12.50 HR
attributes.background:
The fuel prices are at massive high some ppl will soon struggle getting to work. 
When oil was 109 fuel was only £1.19 litre now oil is at its lowest and the price £1.86 litre

rejection.details:
You are more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing:https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282

Cap profit fuel forecourt operators can make on petrol and diesel to 10p/litre: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616956
